description: Porsche needs to show it can extract more of its passionate customers’ money. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Buying frenzy leaves Porsche fans waiting for more than a year
title_page: Buying frenzy leaves Porsche fans waiting for more than a year | The Straits Times
maintext:
You can call such frenzy buying as “revenge driving”. Car enthusiasts who are keen to splash the cash on a new Porsche 911 sports car will have a hard time getting their hands on one.
If you order one today, it probably won’t be delivered for more than a year because the German company’s order books are overflowing.
